titles.title: Inflation Relief Act
Inflation Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individuals a refundable credit for a portion of Federal income tax liability for 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Inflation Relief Act
This bill allows a refundable income tax credit for 10% of federal tax liability for a taxable year beginning in 2024. The credit is not available to taxpayers whose modified adjusted gross income exceeds $150,000 ($250,000 for joint tax returns) in any taxable year.
